= Introduction =
 * Author: Bast
 * This is a plugin that puts quest info into a miniwindow

= Installation ==
 * Required 
  * [miniwin] and all of its dependencies
  * [pluginhelper] and all of its dependencies
  * [verify]
  * [ldplugin]
  * [broadcast_quest]
 * see the [Download] Page, and copy the file into worlds\plugins\Aardwolf

= Troubleshooting =
 * type "mquest debug" to enable debugging

 {{{
miniwin_quest v1 Quest Commands
-----------------------------------------------
debug          : toggle debugging
fonts          : show fonts loaded in this miniwin
help           : show help
reset          : reset settings to default values
save           : save plugin variables
set            : set settings
toggle         : toggle window
